description:
Heidayu`s Bisharp is an extremely strong Pok√©mon that can often battle multiple opponents on its own. Heidayu`s was a member of Kagetomo`s ninja corps and he pledged eternal loyalty to him and Kirikizan is loyal to Heidayu.
While the rest of the ninja corps captured Hanzo from the ninja village, Heidayu`s Bisharp strong battling stalled and bought enough time for them to complete that task.
When the people from the Ninja Village came to rescue Hanzo, Heidayu`s Bisharp battled against Ash`s Frogadier, Pikachu and Sanpei`s Greninja. It lead for most the battle until Ash`s Frogadier evolved into Ash`s Greninja and became much stronger and Heidayu`s Bisharp wasn`t able to contain them.
name: Kirikizan (Heidayu)
